A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Hollywoodized rehatch of Empire Strikes Back. Thin story line with back to back action sequence may capture the attention of the ADHD band-wagoner\, but seriously\, these last 2 sequels of the Star Wars sega is garbage rehatch of the original IV and V\, completely uninspiring. The only good thing coming out of this is the justice the movie did for General Organa\, RIP Carrie Fisher.
